safe.name: Safe Vanguard
safe.slogan: Securing Success, Connecting Networks: Your Trusted Partners in Cybersecurity and Networking Excellence.

section1.text1: Safe Vanguard is a company specialized in providing IT Security and Networking Consulting and Support Solutions and Services. They offer a holistic approach to security, focusing on people and data, and dealing with the needs of mobility and IoT devices.
section1.text2: They offer services such as security assessments, business transformation advice, end-user training and awareness, consulting, monitoring and networking support. They offer customized solutions that maximize companies' security through advanced technologies and international partnerships.
section1.text3: Their mission is to be the trusted partner of organizations looking to safeguard their data, mitigate security risks and optimize their overall security posture.
section1.text4: They believe in empowering their clients through experience, collaboration and innovative solutions to create resilience and achieve the desired results.

section2.title: Cybersecurity Services
text: Security for people and data in IT services.
Assessment of organizations' security state, addressing vulnerabilities, redundancy, and resilience.
Design, implementation, and support of tailored cybersecurity solutions.

section2.title: End-User Training
text: Training for end-users on IT-related themes and risks.

section2.title: Networking Services
text: LAN, WAN, and Wi-Fi network services.
Assessment of organizations' network state, addressing security, redundancy, and resilience.
Design, implementation, and support of LAN, WAN, and Wi-Fi networks, including 'site surveys.'
